doc:
Charles King (character actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_King_(character_actor) 0 Charles Lafayette King (February 21, 1895 – May 7, 1957) was an American film actor who appeared in over 400 films between 1915 and 1953. According to the Internet Movie Database, his first film appearance was in The Birth of a Nation, but this is unconfirmed. King was born in Dallas, Texas, and died in Hollywood, California, from cirrhosis of liver. Charles_Lafayette_King ( February_21_,_1895 – May_7_,_1957 ) was an_American_film_actor who appeared in over_400_films between 1915_and_1953 . According to the_Internet_Movie_Database , his_first_film_appearance was in The_Birth of a_Nation , but this is unconfirmed . King was_born in Dallas , Texas , and died in Hollywood , California , from cirrhosis of liver .
